mapper.insert: insert into tbl_todo (title, dueDate, writer, finished) values (#{title}, #{dueDate}, #{writer}, #{finished})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_todo order by tno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_todo set title = #{title}, dueDate = #{dueDate}, finished = #{finished} where tno = #{tno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_todo order by tno desc limit #{skip}, #{size} -- 여기서 PageRequestDTO_0224의 getSkip()은 getter로 skip이기 때문에 #{skip}, #{size}는 변수 size
